jgame.sprite

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • jgame.sprite.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoopingSprite

    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a sprite.
    Every game object has its own sprite
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Almeida

        end, - the end of the sprite animation
